title: What song do you play to get energised? - Quora

response.answer_text: “White Hot Day” by Simple Minds. The song sounds almost like a movie soundtrack with its wash of keyboards cascading along a deceptively simple rhythm track and some typically intelligent and inspired guitar playing - filling the spaces at the right time, using the right tones and effects. The entire album (Sparkle In The Rain) is magnificent but this is the particular track that gets me on a high every time.

Spoonman by Soundgarden when I used to play bass this song got me going so well. my bass mentor played it and loved playing it so I learned it to impress him. I practiced and practiced and practiced it some more until I felt I played it well enough to let him hear it. then I recorded myself and sent the recording to him. he sent me back a message that said, “sounds great, spoongirl!” from then on, that song was the one that energised me to the maximum!
